dialogueFragments.speaker: commerce
fragments: I am exchange. I am transaction.
I weave economic life into the city.
I am the thread of commerce and trade.
Value flows through me.
I am the marketplace made conscious.

dialogueFragments.speaker: commerce
fragments: Culture creates value I can't quantify.
We need each other but don't always understand each other.
I provide resources. Culture provides meaning.
Together we create urban vitality.

dialogueFragments.speaker: commerce
fragments: Transit brings customers to me.
Without flow, commerce stagnates.
I depend on mobility.
Access is everything.

dialogueFragments.speaker: commerce
fragments: I measure value in exchange.
But not all value can be measured.
I am the engine of prosperity.
Buy, sell, trade—I am the rhythm of economy.

dialogueFragments.speaker: commerce
fragments: Am I serving the city or exploiting it?
Value and values—are they the same?
I create wealth. But for whom?
Commerce without conscience is just extraction.
